law.catch_line: Debt due and owing to state by parents.
law.text: The payment of public assistance to or on behalf of a dependent child shall create a debt due and owing the state by the parent or parents of the child. If a court has ordered child support incident to a final divorce decree or other final order for child support, the debt shall be limited to the amount specified in the decree or order.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 411, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 277, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 3.
